entries.title: We are currently testing the Nvidia RTX 4090—let us show you its heft
entries.description: We can't say much yet, but its size may clarify who this $1,599-and-up GPU isn't for.

entries.title: Fall COVID surge begins in Europe—and US outlook already looks rough
entries.description: With subvariant soup simmering, OG BA.5 kicks off fall COVID surge.

entries.title: Did an NYU professor get fired because students hate organic chem?
entries.description: There's a lot to the recent firing, most of it centered on how to best serve students.

entries.title: No fix in sight for mile-wide loophole plaguing a key Windows defense for years
entries.description: Lazarus is latest group to pull off "bring your own vulnerable device" attack.

entries.title: You better watch out for David Harbour’s badass Santa in Violent Night trailer
entries.description: It's like The Ref meets Mel Gibson's Fat Man, with a side of John Wick.

entries.title: Google’s newest AI generator creates HD video from text prompts
entries.description: Not to be outdone by Meta, Google's AI generator can output 1280x768 HD video at 24 fps.

entries.title: Zelle fraud is on the rise—and many victims are denied refunds
entries.description: Four banks alone expect more than $255 million in scam and fraud claims in 2022.

entries.title: Click! 2022 Nobel goes to chemistry made simple and reliable
entries.description: Simplifying the complexity of organic chemistry, both in concept and practice.

entries.title: Crew Dragon launches safely, carrying first Russian from US soil in 20 years
entries.description: "Whooo, that was a smooth ride uphill!"

entries.title: Release nears for tabbed File Explorer, taskbar updates in Windows 11 22H2
entries.description: Update for the 2022 Update will be released to the public this month.

entries.title: The Galaxy Fold 4 is on sale for $1,499.99, up to $420 off
entries.description: For some reason, the 256GB and 512GB versions are the same price.

entries.title: Amazon’s Glow goes the way of the Fire Phone and dodo
entries.description: Slow sales are reportedly to blame.

entries.title: After cutting radar, Tesla now dropping ultrasonic sensors from its EVs
entries.description: Most automakers use multiple redundant sensors. Tesla thinks otherwise.

entries.title: Today’s best deals: Google Pixel, Surface Pro 8, Amazon Kindle, and more
entries.description: Dealmaster also has Garmin watches, 4K TVs, robot vacuums, and our favorite streaming sticks.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 launch marred by multiple DDoS attacks
entries.description: Report suggest server queues are tens of thousands of players long.

entries.title: Why Musk gave up: He’s almost certain to lose Twitter case, law professor says
entries.description: Court case over broken merger deal only happened "because Elon Musk is Elon."

entries.title: Who is ready for a fleet of cubesats flying over cities, displaying ads?
entries.description: "Space advertising turns out to have a potential for commercial viability."

entries.title: Intel A770, A750 review: We are this close to recommending these GPUs
entries.description: New GPU series, ranging from $289 to $349, is less "amazing" and more "interesting."
